sourcesContent:
<template>
  <WeatherType/>
  <CurrentWeather/>
  <WeekForcast/>
  <Character/>
</template>

<script>
import Character from './components/Character.vue';
import CurrentWeather from './components/CurrentWeather.vue';
import WeatherType from './components/WeatherType.vue'
import WeekForcast from './components/WeekForcast.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    WeatherType,
    CurrentWeather,
    WeekForcast,
    Character
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getWeather();
  },
  methods: {
    getWeather() {
      this.getLocation();
    },
    getLocation() {
      console.log('Location: ', navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition());
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
